SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO t_gq_fss_loan (id,cust_no,user_no,acc_no,contract_id,contract_no,contract_amt,pay_amt,bespoke_date,trade_type,seq_no,mortgagee_acc_no,create_time,mchn_parent,mchn_child,loan_platform) VALUES (null,#{custNo},#{userNo},#{accNo},#{contractId},#{contractNo},#{contractAmt},#{payAmt},#{bespokeDate},#{tradeType},#{seqNo},#{mortgageeAccNo},#{createTime},#{mchnParent},#{mchnChild},#{loanPlatform})
